EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 300 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 33-50N 019-05E AT 280730Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
